meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be presented.
meanings.sent1: Her presentation skills showcased her excellent presentabilities.
meanings.sent2: The new software has great presentabilities for creating interactive presentations.
meanings.sent3: The magician's presentabilities were so impressive that the audience thought he had real magic powers.
meanings.sent4: His presentabilities on the dance floor were like a mesmerizing performance.
meanings.sent5: The artist's presentabilities transformed a simple canvas into a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The ability to be presented or shown.
meanings.sent1: The product's presentabilities made it stand out among the competitors.
meanings.sent2: The museum's exhibit had limited presentabilities due to space constraints.
meanings.sent3: The cat's presentabilities included hiding in unexpected places.
meanings.sent4: The treasure map's presentabilities led the adventurers to a hidden cave.
meanings.sent5: The actor's presentabilities shone brightly on the big screen.
